message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a fantastic opportunity to purchase my product. Considering its value, I'm setting the initial price at $950,000. This is a fair starting point for negotiation, don't you think?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I'm willing to make a serious investment in your product, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand your perspective on the budget.  How about we meet halfway? I'm willing to come down to $925,000. This reflects the true value of the product.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short of my target. Would you be willing to go down to $920,000? I'm really interested in making this deal happen, and I think we can both benefit from it.
